title: Brutal Doom V.1.9 (With Doom 1 and 2)
description:
This is Doom 1 and 2 with the mod Brutal Doom pre-packed! There is little instruction needed, so here is how to run it:

1. Extract the folder to wherever you want it to be on your computer

2. create a shortcut for "gzdoom.exe" and place it on your desktop

3. Now right click the shortcut and select "Properties"

4. Under "Target", go past the lase quotation mark and make a space

5. Now after the space, type (or copy and paste) this, "-file brutal19.pk3 DoomMetalVol4.wad"

6. In the end, the shortcuts target should look like this:
"C:Documents and SettingsOwnerMy DocumentsDownloadsGamesBrutal Doomgzdoom.exe" -file brutal19.pk3 DoomMetalVol4.wad
(Minus the part before the -file command)

Now it should be ready to play!
